TopicTitle: Your Unusual Tricks of the Trade

Articles.Content:
On 5/6/2018 at 9:25 AM, Geonovast said:

I've been getting into the habit of disabling staging on late-mission decouplers.  That was you either have to stick it on an action group (harder to accidentally hit, or impossible with AGX) or right click on it and decouple manually.

@Geonovast mentioned this in another thread and I thought it smart enough to mention here.

And it's always worthwhile to remind people of stage-lock, Alt-L, which completely disables staging until you alt-L again.  Command-L on mac.
